Literature.Title: Understanding the Role of Self-Assembly and Interaction with Biological Membranes of Short Cationic Lipopeptides in the Effective Design of New Antibiotics
Literature.Author: Stachurski O, Neubauer D, Walewska A, Iłowska E, Bauer M, Bartoszewska S, Sikora K, Hać A, Wyrzykowski D, Prahl A, Kamysz W, Sikorska E

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:5% Hemolysis=100 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=250 µg/ml,Human keratinocytes HaCat:IC50=25.11±6.17 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=128µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 14990(MIC=2µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=64µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=64µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=4µg/ml)
